Antiheroes is a new five-episode superhero comedy web series by Cracked Studios about a group of slacker friends and co-workers who all have amazing superpowers. The only problem is that they would much rather not use their special abilities for good. Episodes of the new series are being released every other day on Cracked.com, with the fifth and final episode airing on Wednesday, August 13th, 2014.
